morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does to oneself or for oneself
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action should or must happen
morphInfos.personExplained: they are a person or thing being spoken or written about
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.description: _he/she/it should or must do him/her/itself_ good
morphInfos.explanation: an action that certainly happens to or for a person or thing being discussed
